name: RE:PAIRN'T
description:
A simple game where a remorseful father must mend the broken relationships with his children because of the pressures he himself put upon them. CONTROLS WASD - Movement
Spacebar - Jump
Mouse - Aim
Left Click (Hold) - Give Hearts HOW TO PLAY Aim with the mouse, dodge attacks, and fill up their bar by giving hearts! CREDITS DESIGN, CODE, SFX
